00029 #ifndef __L4_COMPILER_H__
00030 #define __L4_COMPILER_H__
00031 
00032 #if !defined(__ASSEMBLY__) && !defined(__ASSEMBLER__)
00033 
00040 
00045 #ifndef L4_INLINE
00046 #ifndef __cplusplus
00047 #  ifdef __OPTIMIZE__
00048 #    define L4_INLINE_STATIC static __inline__
00049 #    define L4_INLINE_EXTERN extern __inline__
00050      /* gcc-4.3 implements c99 inline behaviour, i.e. we use the
00051       * 'extern  inline' there, 4.2 and below use 'static inline' */
00052 #    if (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ <= 2) || __GNUC__ <= 3
00053 #      define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_STATIC
00054 #    else
00055 #      ifdef __GNUC_STDC_INLINE__
00056 #        define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_STATIC
00057 #      else
00058 #        define L4_INLINE L4_INLINE_EXTERN
00059 #      endif
00060 #    endif
00061 #  else /* ! __OPTIMIZE__ */
00062 #    define L4_INLINE static
00063 #  endif /* ! __OPTIMIZE__ */
00064 #else /* __cplusplus */
00065 #  define L4_INLINE inline
00066 #endif  /* __cplusplus */
00067 #endif  /* L4_INLINE */
00068 
00069 #if ((__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__) >= 405)
00070 # define L4_DECLARE_CONSTRUCTOR(func, prio) \
00071   static inline __attribute__((constructor(prio))) void func ## _ctor_func(void) { func(); }
00072 #else
00073 
00074 
00080 #if defined (__ARM_EABI__)
00081 #  define L4_DECLARE_CONSTRUCTOR(func, prio) \
00082     static __typeof(&func) func ## _ctor__ __attribute__((used,section(".init_array." L4_stringify(prio)))) = &func;
00083 #else
00084 #  define L4_DECLARE_CONSTRUCTOR(func, prio) \
00085     static __typeof(&func) func ## _ctor__ __attribute__((used,section(".ctors." L4_stringify(prio)))) = &func;
00086 #endif
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 
00090 
00188 #ifndef __cplusplus
00189 #  define L4_NOTHROW__A       __attribute__((nothrow))
00190 #  define L4_NOTHROW
00191 #  define EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00192 #  define EXTERN_C_END
00193 #  define EXTERN_C
00194 #  ifndef __BEGIN_DECLS
00195 #    define __BEGIN_DECLS
00196 #  endif
00197 #  ifndef __END_DECLS
00198 #    define __END_DECLS
00199 #  endif
00200 #  define L4_DEFAULT_PARAM(x)
00201 #else /* __cplusplus */
00202 #  define L4_NOTHROW throw()
00203 #  define EXTERN_C_BEGIN extern "C" {
00204 #  define EXTERN_C_END }
00205 #  define EXTERN_C extern "C"
00206 #  ifndef __BEGIN_DECLS
00207 #    define __BEGIN_DECLS extern "C" {
00208 #  endif
00209 #  ifndef __END_DECLS
00210 #    define __END_DECLS }
00211 #  endif
00212 #  define L4_DEFAULT_PARAM(x) = x
00213 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00214 
00219 #define L4_NORETURN __attribute__((noreturn))
00220 
00225 #define L4_NOINSTRUMENT __attribute__((no_instrument_function))
00226 #ifndef L4_HIDDEN
00227 #  define L4_HIDDEN __attribute__((visibility("hidden")))
00228 #endif
00229 #ifndef L4_EXPORT
00230 #  define L4_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00231 #endif
00232 #define L4_STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname) L4__STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname)
00233 #define L4__STRONG_ALIAS(name, aliasname) \
00234   extern __typeof (name) aliasname __attribute__ ((alias (#name)));

00239 #include <l4/sys/linkage.h>
00240 
00241 #if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 96
00242 #define __builtin_expect(x, expected_value) (x)
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 #define EXPECT_TRUE(x)  __builtin_expect((x),1)   ///< Expression is likely to execute. \hideinitializer
00246 #define EXPECT_FALSE(x) __builtin_expect((x),0)   ///< Expression is unlikely to execute. \hideinitializer
00247 
00248 #if (__GNUC__ == 3 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 3) || __GNUC__ >= 4
00249 /* Make sure that the function is not removed by optimization. Without the
00250  * "used" attribute, unreferenced static functions are removed. */
00251 #define L4_STICKY(x)  __attribute__((used)) x         ///< Mark symbol sticky (even not there) \hideinitializer
00252 /* The deprecated attribute is available with 3.1 and higher (3.3 as here
00253  * is ok for us */
00254 # if (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 5) || __GNUC__ >= 5
00255 # define L4_DEPRECATED(s) __attribute__((deprecated(s)))     ///< Mark symbol deprecated. \hideinitializer
00256 # else
00257 # define L4_DEPRECATED(s) __attribute__((deprecated))     ///< Mark symbol deprecated. \hideinitializer
00258 # endif
00259 #else
00260 /* The "used" attribute is not available with older gcc versions so simply
00261  * make sure that gcc doesn't warn about unused functions. */
00262 #define L4_STICKY(x)  __attribute__((unused)) x       ///< Mark symbol sticky (even not there).
00263 #define L4_DEPRECATED(s)                                ///< Mark symbol deprecated
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #ifndef __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__
00267 #ifndef static_assert
00268 #define static_assert(x, y) \
00269   do { (void)sizeof(char[-(!(x))]); } while (0)
00270 #endif
00271 #endif
00272 
00273 #define L4_stringify_helper(x) #x                       ///< stringify helper. \hideinitializer
00274 #define L4_stringify(x)        L4_stringify_helper(x)   ///< stringify. \hideinitializer
00275 
00276 #ifndef __ASSEMBLER__

00280 L4_INLINE void l4_barrier(void);
00281 
00285 L4_INLINE void l4_mb(void);
00286 
00290 L4_INLINE void l4_wmb(void);
00291 
00292 
00293 /* Implementations */
00294 L4_INLINE void l4_barrier(void)
00295 {
00296   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00297 }
00298 
00299 L4_INLINE void l4_mb(void)
00300 {
00301   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00302 }
00303 
00304 L4_INLINE void l4_wmb(void)
00305 {
00306   __asm__ __volatile__ ("" : : : "memory");
00307 }
00308 #endif

00312 #endif /* !__L4_COMPILER_H__ */
